short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables the Pan and Zoom feature in Hudl

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unofficial Hudl plugin that enables the Pan and Zoom feature in Hudl.
For American Football, pan and zoom is only available in Hudl Beta.

Instructions:
Once the plugin is enabled, you can use your mouse scroll wheel to zoom on the video and then do a click and drag to pan around.
